column5: Friend of mine is going up to this lodge first of June this spring. I said I would do some checking up on this lodge for them on this sight. Anyone been there? what is the fishing like? Accomodations? Guides? and bait availibility? Any info would be appreciated Thanks in advance.

I have been going to Esnagami for about 10 years now and I think that speaks for itself. Email me at [email protected] and I will get into more depth. I am booked for this year on the 3rd week of June!!
